title: CALLBACK_WAIT
description: Specialised descendant of `EVENT_ACTION <CALL_BACK_NOTIFICATION>` that adds a fail action. Used for representing post-callback actions.
$comments: Defined in Definition IM, inherits from EVENT_WAIT

event.description: Callback notification on which this Callback wait state is based.

success_action.description: Action to perform if any listened-for event returns a success result.

timeout.description: Timeout handler to use if no other Event is received within a certain time.

fail_action.description: Action to perform if any listened-for event returns a fail result.
